SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities

Record Class LinkedAnimationWithCallBack

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.LinkedAnimationWithCallBack
Record Components:
rowStart - the 0-based row-index of the first sprite to be shown
columnStart - the 0-based column-index of the first sprite to be shown
rowEnd - the 0-based row-index of the last sprite to be shown
columnEnd - the 0-based column-index of the last sprite to be shown
cycleTimeInMs - the interval for sprite cycling that will be used when playing this Animation
next - the Animation that should be played when this Animation has finished
callback - the AnimationCallback that muts be called when this Animation has finished
All Implemented Interfaces:
Animation
public record LinkedAnimationWithCallBack(int rowStart, int columnStart, int rowEnd, int columnEnd, long cycleTimeInMs, Animation next, AnimationCallback callback) extends Record implements Animation
A LinkedAnimationWithCallBack implements the interface Animation with the ability to set the next Animation to be played, after this one has finished. This way it is possible to create a linked list of animations that are played in order.

Contrary to the LinkedAnimation, this version also calls the provided callback-method.
